name: Six Wheels and a Gun
description:
Experience realistic battlefield bashes in a six wheeled buggy!

Battle your opponents online or fight A.I. enemies off line and rise through the ranks of the Cavalry.

The simulation is of exceptional high fidelity, and comes with gorgeous super sharp retina vector graphics. This is much like BattleZone on steroids.

Follow me on Twitter @BramStolk
http://stolk.org
